rules_text:
Flash
When Veilborn Meddler enters, counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to Veilborn Meddler's power.
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Veilborn Meddler.
flavor_text: [i]The latest innovations in troubleshooting from the Iken Company wouldn't receive League approval.[/i]
